entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 8 April 2023
